title-part.text: SACKS OR PACKS CARRIED ON THE BODY

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers only the equipment specified in its subdivisions. Travelling or camp equipment is normally classified in the classes for the equipment concerned, e.g. camp furniture A47.

title-part.text: Sacks or packs carried on the body

CPC-specific-text.text: Sacks or packs carried on the body by means of a single strap around the waist

title-part.text: Sacks or packs carried on the body by means of one strap passing over the shoulder
Sacks or packs carried on the body by means of two straps passing over the two shoulders

CPC-specific-text.text: specially adapted for school children
with adjustable fastenings for the shoulder straps or waist belts

title-part.text: Harnesses specially adapted for carrying small boats
Article supports adapted to be stuck into the ground

reference.text: posts driven into the ground E04H12/2215
holders or cabinets for maps A47B97/02

title-part.text: Travelling or camp articles which may be converted into

CPC-specific-text.text: other
or into objects

title-part.text: Sacks or packs carried on the body and convertible into other articles

CPC-specific-text.text: or into objects for other use

title-part.text: Sacks or packs convertible into other articles

CPC-specific-text.text: or into objects for other use

title-part.text: Coats or capes convertible into tent coverings
Holders or carriers for hand articles
Holders or carriers for use while travelling or camping

CPC-specific-text.text: with an automatic spring reel
to the belt
within pockets

title-part.text: Holding handkerchiefs, napkins, or the like

CPC-specific-text.text: travelling
handles of sacks or bags B65D33/06, straps provided with handles for bundling or supporting articles B65D63/18, for carrying heavy loads B65G7/12
with means, e.g. a hook, receiving a carrying element of the hand article to be carried
the carrying element being flexible, e.g. plastic bag handle
and supported above the grip surface of the carrying handle

title-part.text: Holders for spades, hatchets, or like implements
Sacks or packs carried on the body
Sacks or packs carried on the body by means of a single strap passing around the neck
specially adapted for carrying specific objects
Sacks or packs carried on the body by means of straps passing around an arm or a leg
Sacks or packs carried on the body by means of one strap passing around the neck and one additional strap around the waist
Sacks or packs carried on the body by means of one strap passing around the waist and additional straps around a leg or an arm
Sacks or packs carried on the body by means of one strap passing over the shoulder
and one additional strap around the waist
Sacks or packs carried on the body by means of two straps passing over the two shoulders
and one additional strap around the waist
Back cushioning parts or details of backpacks, e.g. with ventilation
Dorsal or hip pads for the lumbar back or for the waist
Hydration systems attached to the body by straps, e.g. incorporated in a backpack
Travelling or camp articles which may be converted into

CPC-specific-text.text: other
or into objects

title-part.text: Sacks or packs carried on the body and convertible into other articles

CPC-specific-text.text: or into objects for other use

title-part.text: Holders or carriers for hand articles, or for use while travelling or camping, convertible into articles for other use
Pack-frames, pack-carrying harnesses, carrying straps or shoulder-pads convertible into articles for other use
Sacks or packs convertible into other articles

CPC-specific-text.text: or into objects for other use

title-part.text: into articles covered by groups A45F3/00 to A45F3/15
Holders or carriers for hand articles
Holders or carriers for use while travelling or camping
comprising a suspension strap or lanyard
Hand articles fastened to the wrist or to the arm or to the leg
to a fastening element of the garment, e.g. button
with a holder or item rotatably connected to the fastening device, e.g. having a rotation axis perpendicular to the garment
with a pin having an enlarged head detachably connected to a fastening device, e.g. to a pin receiving slot
with a horizontal and parallel rotation axis, i.e. the axis being parallel to the surface of the garment

CPC-specific-text.text: travelling
handles of sacks or bags B65D33/06, straps provided with handles for bundling or supporting articles B65D63/18, for carrying heavy loads B65G7/12

title-part.text: with means embracing the hand article to be carried

CPC-specific-text.text: with means, e.g. a hook, receiving a carrying element of the hand article to be carried
the carrying element being flexible, e.g. plastic bag handle

title-part.text: and supported below the grip surface of the carrying handle
and supported near the lateral ends of the grip surface of the carrying handle
Carrying handles intended for receiving parcel cords or package bands
specially adapted for crossed cords or bands
Retaining means for controlled release of the carrying element
Details not otherwise provided for in K45F
Holder or carrier for specific articles
Portable audio devices, e.g. walkman, discman, radio, MP3 player, headphones
Portable handheld communication devices, e.g. mobile phone, pager, beeper, PDA, smart phone
Personal portable computing devices, e.g. laptop, tablet, netbook, game boy, navigation system, calculator
Cameras, e.g. reflex, digital, video camera
Thin, flat, rectangular articles, e.g. ID badges or cards
Defense articles, e.g. small arms, handguns, pistols, or the like
